Header.title: Welcome to the city!
Header.paragraph: 5000 game access cards launching on the Solana blockchain

About.paragraph: Metalife is a sandbox P2E game where you can do, create and discover whatever you imagine. From driving amazing cars around the Metalife city, to carrying out some types of jobs to earn money and build your own house. Our game has everything people like about The Sims and everything they like about Grand Theft Auto, so what better combination to get you into the city!

Services.name: Launch
Services.text: Metalife access passes will be available in a public mint. First come first serve, 1 SOL + fees. 5000 - (whitelisted members' passes minted from pre-sale) will be available to mint.

Services.name: Right after mint
Services.text: • Secondary market listing on Magic Eden. • Grant access to the Metalife game pre Alpha to every holder. • Creation of the Metalife DAO. Metalife community to proceed with the further development of the game. Funds will be used to improve the game and to reward Metalife players.
